epics.title: Air Cargo Booking and Tracking
epics.description: Enable booking, tracking, and management of air freight shipments for customers and operations.

stories.title: As a freight forwarder, I want to book cargo space on a flight
As an airline operator, I want to view real-time flight and cargo status

bugs.title: Flight tracking map not updating for delayed flights
Cargo booking form allows overbooking beyond aircraft capacity

tasks.title: Integrate with IATA flight data API
Write unit tests for cargo booking logic
